gameState

Class LevelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameState.GameState
      • gameState.LevelState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level1State, Level2State, Level3State, Level4State, Level5State, Level6State, Level7State, Level8State

    public class LevelState
extends GameState
    Base class for all LevelXStates and extends GameState. Has all common functions and variables including loading in the tileMap and player and updating and drawing everything in the level.
    Author:
    Alex Xu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Background bg
      background for this levelState

      basic counter for end game

      boolean indicating if this levelState has been initialized

      integer describing which level

      the player object in this levelState

      boolean indicating if the game is paused

      TileMap for this levelState
